title: "Fig 5b,c: intensity ratio"
output: pdf_document

```{r setup, include=FALSE, message=F}
source(here::here("setup.R"))
source(here::here("src", "get_intensity_ratio.R"))
source(here::here("src", "plotting", "plot_intensity_ratio.R"))
```

```{r}
df <- read_tsv(here::here("data", "processed", "peptides_preprocessed_TP.tsv"), show_col_types = FALSE)
```

```{r}
stats <- get_intensity_ratio(df) 
```


```{r, fig.width=12, fig.height=14}
plot_intensity_ratio(stats[stats$match_ig_type %in% HC_names, ])
```


# Supplementary

```{r, fig.width=12, fig.height=14}
plot_intensity_ratio(stats[stats$match_ig_type %in% LC_names, ])
```
